Class EmotiveTestAgent

java.lang.Object
nl.uu.cs.aplib.mainConcepts.BasicAgent
nl.uu.cs.aplib.agents.AutonomousBasicAgent
eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts.TestAgent
eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts.EmotiveTestAgent
public class EmotiveTestAgent extends TestAgent
An extension of TestAgent that can also has emotion.
Author:
Wish

  • Field Details

    • estate

      protected IEmotionState estate
      Field holding the agent's emotion.

  • Constructor Details

    • EmotiveTestAgent

      public EmotiveTestAgent()

    • EmotiveTestAgent

      public EmotiveTestAgent​(String id, String role)
      Create a plain instance of emotive-TestAgent with the given id and role. To be useful you will need to add few other things to it, e.g. a state and a goal. You also need to link it to a TestDataCollector.

  • Method Details

    • attachEmotionState

      public EmotiveTestAgent attachEmotionState​(IEmotionState estate)
      Attach an emotion state to this agent. By this we mean attaching a structure that can represent the agent's emotion.

    • getEmotionState

      public IEmotionState getEmotionState()
      Return the agent current emotion.

    • update

      public void update()
      This will do the standard test-agent update() as defined by TestAgent. Additionally, this will also trigger an update to the emotional-state held by this agent.
      Overrides:
      update in class TestAgent
